Class should be complete with self.Const and self.Dev, nothing more

get_total_uncert(meas, unit, runit)[source]¶

Collects all Uncertainty contrib for the given measurant (m). Calculates the quadratic sum and returns a np.array of the length as m.

Calculates the error of indication by means of the expression stored

  • punit (str) – punit pressure unit
  • runit (str) – runit unit of values returned

vpy.device.srg module¶

class vpy.device.srg.Srg(doc, dev)[source]¶

Bases: vpy.device.device.Device

SRG

dcr_conversion(unit='mbar', gas='N2')[source]¶

Calculates the conversion constant \(K\) between DCR and unit by means of

\(K = \sqrt{ \frac{ 8 R T }{ \pi M}} \pi d \rho /20\)

Parameters:
  • unit (str) – unit unit
  • gas (str) – gas gas
Returns:

conversion factor between DCR and unit
Return type:

float
get_name()[source]¶
pressure(P, T, unit='mbar', gas='N2')[source]¶

Calculates the presssure by means of dcr_conversion. Returns the pressure in the given unit.
